mapper.insert: insert into tequipment(name, description, code, add_time, price, place, user_id) VALUES(#{equipmentVo.name}, #{equipmentVo.description}, #{equipmentVo.code}, now(), #{equipmentVo.price}, #{equipmentVo.place}, #{equipmentVo.userId})
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.description, e.code, e.add_time, e.price, e.place, u.login_name AS userName FROM tequipment e JOIN tuser u ON e.user_id = u.id WHERE u.login_name = #{userName}
